title: T206 and T205 Lots For Sale
author: roomn8

posts.post_title: T206 and T205 Lots For Sale
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone,

Have the following T206 and T205 lots available.   At this point I do not want to break up the lots but if they do not sell I will consider it.  Payment by paypal only (no extra charge) and shipping will be included in the price.  I lurk but do not post much here but can provide references if need be.  Used to sell on eBay under the id roomn8.  Please feel free to PM me but prefer emails at [url]vintagesportscards@roomn8.com[/url].


Thanks,
Daniel

Lot of 10 T206s: Cambell (EPDG), Chase Blue Port, Gasper, Lajoie Batting, Lavender, Lattimore, Miller, Mullin with Bat (OM), Ritter and Wiltse Pitching.  See link for pics of backs and fronts.

[URL="http://roomn8.com/ebaysales/images/t206lot.jpg"]T206 lot[/URL]

Lot of 26 T205s: Austin (AB), Bescher, Blackburne (AB), Brown (AB), Byrne, Camnitz, Collins (Mouth Closed),Jimmy  Collins, Corridon (AB), Delehanty (Cycle), Dickson, Dooin (3), Ferguson, Herzog, Knight, Meyers, Miller, Moran, Nee (2), Stone (2), Tinker and Doc White.  See link for pics of backs and fronts.  

[URL="http://roomn8.com/ebaysales/images/t205lot.jpg"]T205 lot[/URL]

These lots did not sell. Therefore I am accepting offers until Monday April 25 at 7PM EST and each lot will sell to the highest offer. Please make your offers via email. Paypal and shipping is on me. Thank you, Daniel

I'll vouch for mr evans. i bought my first t206 card from him, and the rest is history!
thanks daniel
larry
